plotting.draw_tree¶

plotting.draw_tree(adata: <Mock name='mock.AnnData' id='140108929462480'>, level: Optional[Union[str, int]] = None, color: Optional[str] = None, color_map: Optional[Union[<Mock name='mock.colors.Colormap' id='140107853394656'>, str]] = None, key: str = 'nsbm', ax: Optional[<Mock name='mock.Axes' id='140107853394224'>] = None, show: bool = True, use_backend: Optional[str] = None, save: Optional[str] = None)¶

Plots NSBM hierarchy using graph-tool capabilities

Parameters

  • adata – The annotated data matrix.

  • level – The NSBM level to be plot.

  • color – The adata.obs property used to generate color. It is mutually exclusive with level option.

  • color_map – Th colormap to use for continuous colors

  • save – Name of the output file. If a non interactive notebook is detected, this parameter is automatically set.

  • key – The key used to perform nsbm
